document_data.name: El Kahmir
document_data.mainbody: The '''Kahmirs''' were one of four major crime families operating in [[Calimshan]] in [[1370 DR]]. Until the [[Darkstalker Wars]] in [[1359 DR]], they were the most powerful of all Calishite underworld groups since the [[Seventh Age of Calimshan]].<ref name=EotSS-p72>
document_data.See Also:
The four major crime families of Calimshan in 1370 DR:
* [[El Pesarkhal]]
* El Kahmir
* [[El Vyndahla]]
* [[El Ahimar]]
